Rulings.HAT:
● If another card you control is targeted by "Mystical Space Typhoon":
On a new chain after MST has resolved, this card's ② effect activates.
When that ② effect resolves, this card is destroyed.

Rulings.Base: 1. The self-destroying effect of this card activates when the card hits your GY. It starts a Chain.\n2. While "Imperial Custom" is active, this card will not be destroyed by its own effect.\n3. If your "Mystic Tomato" is attacked and destroyed while "Vanity's Emptiness" is active, you cannot activate the effect of "Mystic Tomato".
